body:
`release-1.5` branch release builds have started to randomly fail; see https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/builds/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-build-1.5/

All the failed builds:
* https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-build-1.5/122/
* https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-build-1.5/127/
* https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-build-1.5/129/
* https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-build-1.5/134/
* https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-build-1.5/138/
* https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-build-1.5/141/
* https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-build-1.5/143/
* https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-build-1.5/144/
* https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-build-1.5/146/

Have the same error:
<details>

```

I0213 08:01:36.857] Makefile:248: recipe for target 'release' failed
E0213 08:01:36.857] Build failed
I0213 08:01:36.858] process 26345 exited with code 1 after 32.9m
E0213 08:01:36.858] FAIL: ci-kubernetes-build-1.5
```

</details>

The flakes correlate with PR https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/40507 merging.

@brendandburns @luxas @pires could you please take a look.

CC @ixdy @kubernetes/test-infra-admins

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a flaky test.
labels.name: kind/flake

title: `release-1.5` build flaking
